description.dutch: Voltooi "Westgate-winkelcentrum", "De Northridge-concertzaal” en "Museum van interessante dingen”
description.english: Complete "Westgate Mall", "The Northridge Philharmonic", and "Museum of Interesting Things"

description.german: Schließe die Aufträge "Das Westgate-Einkaufszentrum", "Die Northridge Philharmonie" und "Museum für interessante Dinge" ab
description.italian: Completa "Centro commerciale di Westgate", "Filarmonica di Northridge" e "Museo delle cose interessanti"

description.tchinese: 完成「西門商場」、「北嶺音樂廳」以及「有趣物品博物館」
description.turkish: "Westgate Alışveriş Merkezi", "Northridge Filarmoni Salonu" ve "İlginç Şeyler Müzesi" inşaatını tamamla
